text: Wa A`tasimu Bihabli Allahi Jami`aan Wa La Tafarraqu Wa Adhkuru Ni`mata Allahi `Alaykum 'Idh Kuntum 'A`da'an Fa'allafa Bayna Qulubikum Fa'asbahtum Bini`matihi 'Ikhwanaan Wa Kuntum `Ala Shafa Hufratin Mina An-Nari Fa'anqadhakum Minha Kadhalika Yubayyinu Allahu Lakum 'Ayatihi La`allakum Tahtaduna
